channel.title: How to enable the quik reply option..?
channel.description:
I never knew that there was a "Quik reply" option on the forum till today O.O I saw it on a screenshot and I asked a member about it and he said that it always been there...
So how do I enable it?
Thanks alot,
Youri

item.title: How to enable the quik reply option..?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

runescape sucks:

Profile > Modify Profile > Look and Layout > Use quick reply on topic display:

Thanks alot! I searched there already but I only read the checkboxes :S

Rep++ xD

Read full topic
item.source: How to enable the quik reply option..?
